case.name: Bounty Industries Limited, in the matter of Bounty Industries Limited [2007] FCA 956 (26 June 2007)

citation.tocase: Re Insurance Australia Group Ltd [2003] FCA 581 ; (2003) 128 FCR 581
citation.text: 7 The principles applicable to this application have been discussed by Lindgren J in Re Insurance Australia Group Ltd [2003] FCA 581 ; (2003) 128 FCR 581 and Re NuSep Ltd [2007] FCA 613. Applying those principles, I am satisfied that there is a discretion to make an order to regularise the present situation and I am satisfied that, subject to the question of substantial injustice, the inadvertent nature of the irregularity and the short time span involved favour grant of the relief sought.

7 The principles applicable to this application have been discussed by Lindgren J in Re Insurance Australia Group Ltd [2003] FCA 581 ; (2003) 128 FCR 581 and Re NuSep Ltd [2007] FCA 613. Applying those principles, I am satisfied that there is a discretion to make an order to regularise the present situation and I am satisfied that, subject to the question of substantial injustice, the inadvertent nature of the irregularity and the short time span involved favour grant of the relief sought.
